str2: A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From hupo and tasso; to subordinate; reflexively, to obey.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Is due, becoming, suitable, proper. From ana and heko; to attain to, i.e. be proper.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
